entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who wants to go to Hogsmeade. He mentions that his aunt and uncle are Muggles who don't understand about Hogwarts forms.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is egging him on to ask Professor McGonagall for permission to go to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student in the class who assumes an 'all-for-the-best' expression when Ron calls Professor McGonagall names.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts who denies Harry's request to go to Hogsmeade without his parent or guardian's permission.

relationships.description: Harry asks Professor McGonagall for permission to go to Hogsmeade, but she denies his request.
Ron's behavior causes anger in Hermione.
